ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Song mix ?
ygData.msgSnippet: I would forget about your chant for a little while, if your experience is anything like mine was--I had so many resists for at *least* the first level that it
ygData.messageBody:
I would forget about your chant for a little while, if your experience is
anything like mine was--I had so many resists for at *least* the first
level that it was the song equivalent of dead weight. I actually did not
use it until I had two chants under my belt, so I could equip the drum
and really *do* something with my DoTs, but that is just me.

-High Lady Karisma Swiftarrow
Guildmistress, Hearts of Valor
http://www.heartsofvalor.com/ (temporarily down, will be up soon)


Visit Swiftarrow's Song at http://www.freespeech.org/karisma
